info.title: OPERA Cloud Front Desk Configuration API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Front Desk Configuration in OPERA Cloud. Here you can find operations to get, post, put and delete front desk codes such as commission codes, transaction groups, codes & subgroups, articles, payment methods and credit card types.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.3.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2023 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

parameters.description: Request to change articles.

200.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

parameters.name: articles
parameters.description: Request to create articles.

201.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

get.description:
Operation to fetch articles.

OperationId:getArticles

parameters.name: universalProductCode
parameters.description: Unique Universal product code search criteria.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Indicator that tells whether to include inactive articles in search results.

200.description: Response for fetching articles.

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Used for codes in the OPERA Code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.

parameters.name: articleCodes
parameters.description: Unique code of the article.

parameters.name: articleHotelId
parameters.description: Hotel code to which the article belongs.

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: Indicates whether the article is inactive or not.

parameters.name: orderSequence
parameters.description: Display Order sequence.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the article.

parameters.name: transactionCode
parameters.description: Transaction code to which the article belongs.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: A monetary amount.

parameters.name: currencyCode
parameters.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

parameters.name: availableForPostIt
parameters.description: Indicates whether the article is available for post it.

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color configuration type. This color configuration provides a visual category of entities.

parameters.name: universalProductCode
parameters.description: Unique Universal product code of the article.

200.description: HATEOAS links which help the consumer to navigate to resources

get.description:
The operation accepts Cashier fetch request and returns Cashiers' list that match the criteria.

OperationId:getCashiers

parameters.name: cashierIDs
parameters.description: Numberic code for cashier ID.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Partial name of a cashier.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Indicator that tells whether to include inactive cashiers in search results.

200.description: Response object for fetching information regarding Cashiers.

This Operation to Change a Cashier.

OperationId:putCashiers

parameters.name: cashiers
parameters.description: Request objects for modifying cashiers

authKey.name: authorization
authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the end user is logged in

x-hubid.name: x-hubid
x-hubid.description: x-hubid is a logical grouping of multiple properties that allows api consumers to manage data from a group of properties. This x-hubid is a valid list of hub codes configured in OPERA to which the user has access. Rest APIs without hotelId in the operation path can support hub level integration using x-hubid

uniqueID_Type.description: An identifier used to uniquely reference an object in a system (e.g. an airline reservation reference, customer profile reference, booking confirmation number, or a reference to a previous availability quote).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success element to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning element MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

status.description: Existing Operations Responses will eventually be modified to be extended from this type.

exceptionDetailType.title: Error Detail
exceptionDetailType.description: Complex type that contains error details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

o:errorDetails.description: Details of the error message, consisting of a hierarchical tree structure.

errorInstance.title: Error Instance Details
errorInstance.description: Complex type that contains error instance details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: Absolute URI that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem.  It may or may not provide additional information if dereferenced.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

hotelId.description: Hotel context for the articles.

codeType.description: Used for codes in the OPERA Code tables. Possible values of this pattern are 1, 101, 101.EQP, or 101.EQP.X.

articlePostItType.description: Post it information of an article.

availableForPostIt.description: Indicates whether the article is available for post it.

color.description: Color indicator which is only configurable if article is available for post it.

colorType.description: Color configuration type. This color configuration provides a visual category of entities.

authorizationConfigRuleType.description: Authorization configuration Rule Type.Authorization Rules specify the rule (or rules) that the property uses for credit card authorizations

rateCode.description: Rate code associated to this rule.

guaranteeCode.description: Guarantee code associated to this rule.

ruleDescription.description: Rule Number description for current authorization.

amount.description: Amount to be applied to all rules with an amount configured in the formula.

percentage.description: Percentage to be applied to all rules with a percentage configured in the formula.

maxDaysToAuthorize.description: A maximum of two digits to set the number of days to authorize for a credit card. If the field is left blank, authorizations will be done for the entire stay duration of the reservation

ignoreDepositsYN.description: Ignore deposits paid for calculation of the amount to be authorized.

roomClassCodeInfoType.description: Code of the room class type.

rateCategoryType.description: This type represents the rate category type.

endDate.description: End date for the rate category.

updateAuthorizers.description: If true, updates all authorizers in the group.

groupHeaderId.description: Group Header Id for a transaction row.

codeDescriptionType.description: This contains a generic code and description information.

translationTextType2000.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 2000.

autoFolioSettlementTypesCriteria.description: Request object for creating Auto Folio Settlement Types.

autoFolioSettlementTypesToBeChanged.description: Request object for changing Auto Folio Settlement Types.

autoFolioSettlementTypes.description: Auto Folio Settlement Typesto be changed.

cashiers.description: Lists of cashiers and their information.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

cashierType.description: Cashier / Interface Cashier / LDAP Template options are provided.

startingAmount.description: The Starting Amount in the Cashier drawer.

floatOverShort.description: Selected if the cashier is allowed to drop below or above the required drop amount.

usageInfo.description: Information about how the cashier is used.

maximumDailyUses.description: The Maximum Daily Uses for the cashier.

history.description: Statistics about the use of the cashier.

lastOpened.description: The date that the cashier last opened.

timesOpened.description: The number of times the cashier has opened their account today.

kiosk.description: Indicator that this cashier is the one to be used by Kiosk Partner to carry out postings and payments for the guest.

inactive.description: Indicator that tells whether the cashier is active or not.

open.description: Indicator that tells whether the cashier is open or not.

cashiers.description: List of cashiers to be modified.

cashierId.description: The Cashier ID of the Cashier who is currently processing the transaction(s).

weekEndCommissionAmount.description: Commission amount that needs to be paid over weekend.

commissionCalculationType.description: Commission calculation type based on details.

timeSpanType.description: Allows for a choice in description of the amount of time spanned by this type. EndDate specifies a specific date, while Duration provides a measure of time to add to the StartDate to yield end date.

resPaymentCardType.description: Information on a credit card for the customer.

approvalCode.description: Approval code sent by the credit card company on a successful authorization.

cardType.description: Indicates the type of credit card from a defined list

expirationDateMasked.description: Masked Expiration date of the credit card

attachCreditCardToProfile.description: Attach the credit card to profile.

processing.description: This contains information on whether EFT is enabled. A value of 'C' indicates EFT is enabled and 'M' indicates manual authorization is available for this payment card type.

cardPresent.description: Flag to determine if the credit card was swiped/manually entered , This element is only used when PAYMENT SERVICE DIRECTIVE(PSD) Opera Control is active.

cardOrToken.description: This contains information on whether credit card is tokenized (token enabled). A value of 'Token' indicates credit card is token enabled and 'CardNumber' indicates non token environment for this payment card type.

citId.description: Customer Initiated Transaction(CIT) Id for Credit Cards. This is only used when PAYMENT SERVICES DIRECTIVE (PSD2) Opera Control is active.

cardTypeType.description: This is required for Credit Card Payment Methods. This indicates the type of Credit Card associated with this payment method.

doNotPost.description: Existence of this element indicates that generate will not be calculated/posted.

roundingMethod.description: Defines the rounding method to be used.

uDFFunctionArguments.description: The function argument name-value combination accepted by the User Defined Function.

doNotPostGenerateType.description: Existance of this type indicates that the generate will not be effective. This is mainly used on Tax Type based generates rule.

generateRoundingMethodType.description: This type is only available for properties with zero decimals. If a property is using decimal points, this type will not be available. The rounding methods which can be specified are: UP, DOWN or NONE.

applicableDays.description: Generates are posted/applicable only for first Applicable Days of the stay.

adjustmentType.description: Indicates type of adjustment procedure required, if there is a need due to the ApplicableDays setting.

generateAdjustmentTypeType.description: Generates calculation bucket/group. Percentage generates are calculated against amount in one of the the calculation bucket.

generateLevelType.description: Defines the level from which the generates was created.

hotelId.description: Code of the Hotel.

codeType.description: Correction type. e.g. ADJ for adjustment, COR for correction, DEL for deletion.

amount.description: Amount or Percentage Value for Adjustment Code

bIRGuest.description: BIR Guest Type in Adjustment Codes.

amountOrPercentageFlag.description: Adjustment Code Calculation Type, valid values are Amount and Percentage.

adjustmentReasonCodeType.description: Defines values for Adjustment reason codes. e.g. ADJ for adjustment, COR for correction, DEL for deletion.

amountOrPercentage.description: Adjustment Code calculation type based on details.

paymentMethodsType.description: Holds the various types of payment methods.

paymentMethodType.description: Provides information about the payment methods. CreditCardCode and CreditCardType help to determine if EFTs are allowed.

paymentMethodTransactionInfo.description: Contains summary information of the transaction.

paymentMethodUsage.description: Contains various usage options permitted for the payment method.

creditLimit.description: Contains the credit limit of a transaction.

paymentMethod.description: Defines the unique identifier for this payment method.

calculatePoints.description: Defines when the points are to be calculated.

inactive.description: Indicates whether the payment method is inactive or not.

cardUsageRules.description: Contains valid usages of the card.

validation.description: Contains rules to validate card information.

merchantNumber.description: The merchant number to use when settling or transmitting credit card information.

cardType.description: Internal code of credit card type.

userDefinedCardType.description: User defined credit card type if credit card type from a defined list is not provided.

processing.description: This contains information on whether EFT is enabled. A value of 'C' indicates EFT is enabled and 'M' indicates manual authorization is available for this payment card type.

cardUsageRulesType.description: Provides information on the various authorization options for a given card type .

authorizationAtCheckin.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used for Authorization at check in.

authorizationDuringStay.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used for Authorization during stay.

authorizationReversal.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used for Authorization reversal can be done.

authorizationSettlementAtCheckout.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used for Authorization settlement can happen during checkout.

cVVCheck.description: Indicates if this payment method needs CVV check.

addressVerification.description: Indicates if this payment method requires an address verification.

promptAtCheckin.description: Indicates if this payment method needs a prompt during check in.

chipAndPin.description: Indicates if this payment method is a chip and pin.

requireIssueNumber.description: Indicates whether issue number is mandatory or not.

requireStartDate.description: Indicates whether start date is mandatory or not.

either.description: Indicates that either Issue Number or Start Date is sufficient.

paymentMethodTransactionInfoType.description: Provides information about the transactions including the transaction code, group, subgroup and the posting amount.

surcharge.description: Surcharge information regarding the payment method.

surchargeType.description: Surcharge information regarding the payment configuration.

minimum.description: Indicates the minimum credit card transaction amount for which the surcharge applies.

percentage.description: Indicates the percentage amount for a credit card transaction.

paymentMethodUsageType.description: This provides information about the various usage options permitted for the given payment method.

billing.description: Indicates if the payment method can be used for Guest Billing

accountsReceivable.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used for Accounts Receivables.

deposit.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used for Deposit payments.

compAccounting.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used for Comp Accounting.

reservation.description: Indicates if this payment method can be used as a Reservation payment method.

posting.description: Indicates if postings can be manually added to the Reservation when this payment method is used.

cash.description: Indicates if this payment method is a Cash type payment method.

calculatePointsType.description: Defines when the points are to be calculated.

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

commissionCodeDetail.description: Response object for fetching commission code details.

compTypesDetails.description: Response object for fetching Comp Types.

futurePastExchangeRates.description: Collection of exchange rates and their information.

parcel.description: Indicates if the Track It belongs to the Parcel Group.

lost.description: Indicates if the Track It belongs to the Lost Group.

result.description: List of charges that will be posted against the transaction code based from the test criteria.

calculatePostingResult.description: List of charges that will be posted against the transaction code based from the test criteria.

charges.description: Charges that will be posted based from the criteria defined.

totalAmount.description: The full amount that would be posted.

calculatePostingCharge.description: Corresponds to each charge that will be posted against the transaction code based from the test criteria.

hotelId.description: Hotel code of the associated transaction code.

transactionCode.description: The associated transaction code of the posting.

level.description: Defines the level from which the transaction generates was created.

amount.description: The amount that will be posted against the transaction code.

formula.description: The formula that is used to calculate the generates.

bucket.description: The amount that will be posted for each bucket.

sequence.description: The order in which the charge will be posted. The base posting will always be 0 (zero) followed by generates associated in order of which they were created.

basePosting.description: Indicates whether it is the base posting.

postingBucket.description: Holds the amount that will be stored in each bucket after posting.

adjustmentCode.description: Transaction code to be used to make adjustments on the posting made using this transaction code.

transactionAdjustments.description: Combination of Adjustment Reason Code and Transaction Adjustment Code.

serviceRecoveryAdjustmentCode.description: Transaction code to be used to make service recovery adjustments on the posting made using this transaction code.

amounts.description: Default Amounts for the Transaction Codes.

gLMapping.description: Gl mapping for transaction codes specific to hotels like Hilton.

associatedTransactionCodes.description: Code and description of the standard transaction code associated to this comp transaction code.

allowServiceRecovery.description: Flag to identify if this transaction code already used as service recovery adjustment code.

universalProductCode.description: Unique Universal product code of the article.

mappingCodes.description: Mapping code and value attached to Transaction Code.

compTransaction.description: If true indicates this transaction codes is for Comp Accounting.

hotelId.description: Hotel's Transaction Code configuration detail.

taxCode.description: Tax Code if the transaction Code if it is of type Tax.

group.description: Group the transaction code belongs to..

subgroup.description: Subgroup the transaction code belongs to.

fiscalTransactionType.description: Transaction code type for fiscal printing purposes.

iRS8300Reporting.description: True indicates the Transaction Code payment will be reposted to IRS according to the rule specified by IRS.

roundingFactor.description: True indicates the Transaction Code posting will have a rounding effect.

generateTaxInvoice.description: Indicates if the Transaction Code payment will generate a Tax Invoice at the time of making a payment. Tax Invoices are used in Thailand.

paymentType.description: Type of payment this transaction code represents.

aR.description: True indicates the payment Transaction Code is used for AR payments.

cashier.description: Indicates whether Profiles are shared across the Hotels within the chain or not.

comp.description: True indicates the payment Transaction Code is used for Comp payments.

deposit.description: True indicates the payment Transaction Code is used for deposits.

interHotelPayment.description: True indicates the payment Transaction Code inter hotel payments.

interHotelDeposit.description: True indicates the payment Transaction Code is used for inter hotel deposits.

cardPaymentTrxSetupType.description: Card Payment Transaction Code configuration details.

processingType.description: Type of processing for the payment.

accountReceivable.description: AR account information to route the payments.

displayCode.description: Display code of the payment Transaction Code.

accountNo.description: The Account Number for the Account.

url.description: URL that identifies the location associated with the record identified by the UniqueID.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID element.

instance.description: The identification of a record as it exists at a point in time. An instance is used in update messages where the sender must assure the server that the update sent refers to the most recent modification level of the object being updated.

idContext.description: Used to identify the source of the identifier (e.g., IATA, ABTA).

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

idExtension.description: Additional identifying value assigned by the creating system.

generatesType.description: Short Summary information of the Chain and it's Hubs and Hotels.

taxInclusive.description: True indicates that the tax is inclusive in the generate.

revenue.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is to be considered as revenue to the Hotel.

manualPosting.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is allowed to be posted manually.

useForPaidout.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is used for Paid outs.

redeemMembershipPoints.description: True indicates the Transaction Code posting are redeemable against the loyalty program points.

includeInDepositRule.description: True indicates the Transaction Code posting will be included in Deposit/Cencallation rule calculations.

depositPostingOnly.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is used for deposit postings only.

postingRule.description: Deposit posting associated with the transaction code.

depositType.description: Represents the type of deposit with possible values of "RECEIPT" or "FOLIO".

checkNoRequired.description: True indicates the Transaction Code requires the Check Number for posting.

interHotelSales.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is used for cross posting across the hotels/.

postCovers.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is used to post covers.

nonTaxable.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is non taxable.

inactive.description: True indicates the Transaction Code is inactive.

ownershipStatus.description: Protected by the Property or Corporate level

serviceType.description: Service Type for the transaction code.

accountingCode.description: Accounting Code for the transaction code.

quantityCode.description: Quantity Code for the transaction code.

transactionAdjustmentType.description: Combination of Adjustment Reason Code and Transaction Adjustment Code.

defaultPrice.description: Default price of the Transaction Code.

minAmount.description: Minimum amount to be posted on this Transaction Code.

maxAmount.description: Maximum Amount to be posted on this Transaction Code.

currency.description: Default currency code for the amounts.

generatesSetupType.description: Defines the Generates Setup and its Calculation Rules.

addBaseAmtTo.description: Defines the buckets the base or posting amount will be added to.

generates.description: Defines the Generates and its Calculation Rules.

gLMappingType.description: Gl mapping for transaction codes specific to hotels like Hilton.

exportMappingId.description: Mapping id associated with linked code.

exportMappingCode.description: Mapping code attached to linked code.

mappingTypeDescription.description: Description of the export mapping type.

mappingCodeDescription.description: Description of the export mapping code.

lovName.description: Name of the LOV group to be used.

sequence.description: Display sequence for the code type.

type.description: Transaction type to which the corresponding transaction group belongs.

generatesAvailable.description: Flag to determine whether generates are available or not

hotelId.description: Hotel Code where the Transaction Group is configured.

sequence.description: Display sequence for the code type.

newGroup.description: Use this attribute to update the existing group during change operation.

type.description: Transaction type to which the corresponding transaction group belongs. This is an information only attribute.

generatesAvailable.description: Flag to determine whether generates are available or not

hotelId.description: Hotel Code where the Transaction Subgroup is configured.

controlSequences.description: Collection of Opera Control Sequence details.

controlSequenceType.description: Provides information about the Opera Control Sequence

hotelId.description: Control Sequence code associated with Hotel

folioType.description: Opera Control Sequence associated with folio

minimum.description: Minimum value of Opera Control Sequence

maximum.description: Maximum value of Opera Control Sequence

countryCode.description: Opera Control Sequence belongs to country

sequenceValue.description: Current Sequence Value for the OPERA Sequence

controlSequenceCodeType.description: Indicates control sequences used for bills. Eg. CREDIT_BILL, FATTURA etc.

revenueBucketCodes.description: Collection of Revenue Bucket Codes configurations.

revenueBucketCodesType.description: Details for Revenue Bucket codes along with associated transaction codes.

revenueBucketCodeType.description: This gives detailed information about a trx code arrangement.

description.description: Description of the trx code arrangement code.

transactionCodes.description: Collection of transaction codes which form the trx code arrangement.

code.description: Code is used to identify a trx code arrangement.

hotelId.description: Identifies the hotel code for which the trx code arrangement is specified.

pointsEligible.description: Bucket is eligible for membership points

bucketValue.description: Stores the default value for the arrangement code for revenue buckets in order to group transaction codes.

bucketType.description: Flag to identify Fiscal related bucket types.

configRoutingInstructionsType.description: This type holds a collection of routing instructions.

configRoutingInstructionType.description: Routing limit can be one of the three: Covers, Limit, Percent. It is not mandatory to set value of either. This field is available when the Cashiering>Routing Limits application function is set to Y.

description.description: Description of the trx code arrangement code.

transactionCodes.description: Collection of transaction codes which form the trx code arrangement.

code.description: Code is used to identify a trx code arrangement.

hotelId.description: Identifies the hotel code for which the trx code arrangement is specified.

covers.description: Number of covers for this routing instruction. Null means no value has been specified.

limit.description: Allowable credit amount for this routing instruction. Null means no value has been specified.

percent.description: The routing limit percentage allowed for this routing instruction. Null means no value has been specified.

daysOfWeek.description: The selected days of the week indicate the days which will be selected on the Routing Instructions screen when this routing code is chosen for the routing instructions.

daily.description: Signifies whether a separate routing instruction has to be generated for each day of the stay.

inheritAuthRateCode.description: Reservation to inherit Rate Code from Authorizer.

compAccounting.description: Determines if this is a comp routing code or a routing code.

timeSpanDaysOfWeekType.description: Container for Time span with days of week.

stopProcessingReasons.description: Response object for fetching Stop Processing Reason.

stopProcessingReasonsType.description: List of the Stop Processing Reasons to be configured or fetched

code.description: Code is used to identify a Stop Processing Reason.

description.description: Description of the Stop Processing Reason.

displaySequence.description: Stop Processing Reason display sequence Number.

transactionCodes.description: Collection of template transaction codes summary.

adjustmentCode.description: Transaction code to be used to make adjustments on the posting made using this transaction code.

transactionAdjustments.description: Combination of Adjustment Reason Code and Transaction Adjustment Code.

serviceRecoveryAdjustmentCode.description: Transaction code to be used to make service recovery adjustments on the posting made using this transaction code.

amounts.description: Default Amounts for the Transaction Codes.

gLMapping.description: Gl mapping for transaction codes specific to hotels like Hilton.

associatedTransactionCodes.description: Code and description of the standard transaction code associated to this comp transaction code.

allowServiceRecovery.description: Flag to identify if this transaction code already used as service recovery adjustment code.

universalProductCode.description: Unique Universal product code of the article.

mappingCodes.description: Mapping code and value attached to Transaction Code.

compTransaction.description: If true indicates this transaction codes is for Comp Accounting.

sequence.description: Display sequence for the code type.

type.description: Transaction type to which the corresponding transaction group belongs.

transactionSubgroups.description: Collection of template transaction subgroups configuration.

sequence.description: Display sequence for the code type.

newGroup.description: Use this attribute to update the existing group during change operation.

type.description: Transaction type to which the corresponding transaction group belongs. This is an information only attribute.

transactionCodes.description: Collection of hotel's transaction codes summary.

trxCodeUsages.description: Contains a list of elements on which the transaction code is used. When attempting to set a transaction code as inactive, a check is performed to make sure the transaction code is not being used before the change operation can be performed. If there are usages, the change operation will fail and this element will be populated with the associated usages for reference.

trxCodeUsagesType.description: Element on which the transaction code is being used.

trxCodeUsageType.description: Details about the element on which the transaction code is being used.

usageName.description: Name of the element type on which the transaction code is being used.

usageDetail.description: Specific codes of the element type on which the transaction code is being used.

tags.name: CashieringConfig
tags.description: Cashiering configurations affect the control and management of financial transactions at your property. You can configure cashiering components for articles for sale, cancellation handling, deposits, folios, settlements, exchange rates, payment methods and so on.

tags.name: CreditCard
tags.description: The Credit Card Internal Service contains operations used internally by OPERA Cloud.

tags.name: CommissionConfig
tags.description: These Commission APIs allow you to get, update, and remove commissions on an Account Receivable (AR) profile in OPERA Cloud.

tags.name: ChainConfig
tags.description: These APIs will allow you to configure front office related configuration related to Administration.

tags.name: HotelConfig
tags.description: These APIs will allow you to configure front office related configuration related to Administration.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Oracle Hospitality
